text: Thomas Antonio "Tom" Conti (born November 22, 1941) is an Scottish writer, movie, television, stage, and voice actor who is known for his roles in; Merry Christmas, Mr. Lawrence, Shirley Valentine, Rueben, Rueben, The Tempest, Saving Grace, The Dark Knight Rises, Paddington 2 and Oppenheimer. Conti has won a Tony Award in 1979. Conti was born on 22 November 1941 in Paisley, Scotland to a Scottish mother and Italian father.Tom Conti Biography (1941-) He studied at Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama. Conti has been married to Kara Drummond Wilson since 1967.
